page.title: 03Transport
page.content:
Transport
Nearly half the people who go to work go on trains.The local underground station has a direct line to London which enables people to travel to work easily.Some people use the buses for travelling to work but often these are used for going shopping. Family cars are used mainly to visit places and are useful for doing the family shopping. There is one car travelling on the Cranbrook Road every three seconds and one every 10 seconds on the Drive.The roads are very congested in this area. In Wanstead Park they are building a motorway.They have taken away all the grass, trees and railings in a certain part of the field.
